Welcome to the enhanced multiplayer experience of Nexon World! This scenario has been carefully crafted to provide the ultimate community gaming experience with balanced PvE/PvP gameplay
Français: and optimized performance for smooth multiplayer gameplay.

English:
Welcome to Nexon World! This enhanced multiplayer scenario features:

• Balanced PvE/PvP gameplay for all skill levels
• Enhanced anti-griefing protection for new players
• Optimized POI regeneration and resource distribution
• Improved structure protection and community building
• Custom starting experience with unique items
• Performance optimized for smooth multiplayer gameplay

Perfect for community servers
Français: and players looking for a balanced

English: Explore the beautifully themed planets of Nexon World
Italiano: and community features designed to enhance your multiplayer adventure.

English: Nexon Prime is the main temperate world featuring:\n\n• Enhanced community hub with trading
Français:
and workshop facilities
• Safe zones for new player protection
• Community workshop for crafting and storage
• Nexon Challenge Arena for special events
• Optimized resource spawning
• Four difficulty levels with custom starting equipment

Perfect starting planet with balanced resources and community features!

English:
Crystal Haven offers a challenging desert environment with:

• Adventure hub for exploration and rescue operations
• Safe zones for PvP protection
• Supply depots for emergency resources
• Heat-resistant starting equipment
• Enhanced crystal and mineral resources
• Adventure-focused community features

Great for experienced players seeking desert challenges!

Obsidian Peak provides a harsh volcanic environment featuring:

• Survival hub with medical and rescue facilities
• Safe zones for player protection
• Medical supply depots
• Antidote pills and protective equipment
• Volcanic resources and challenges
• Survival-focused community support

Challenging environment for advanced survival gameplay!

Azure Depths offers an underwater adventure with:

• Ocean hub for maritime operations
• Safe zones for underwater protection
• Maritime supply depots
• Water bottles and aquatic equipment
• Ocean resources and underwater exploration
• Maritime community features

Unique underwater experience with specialized equipment!

Frost Forge presents a frozen challenge featuring:

• Ice hub for polar operations
• Safe zones for cold weather protection
• Polar supply depots
• Heat-resistant suits and cold weather gear
• Ice resources and frozen landscapes
• Polar community support

Extreme cold environment for hardcore survival!

Verdant Grove offers a lush forest environment with:

• Forest hub for nature-based operations
• Safe zones for forest protection
• Nature supply depots
• Wood logs and plant protein equipment
• Forest resources and natural materials
• Nature-focused community features

Rich forest environment with abundant natural resources!

Nexus Core is the advanced space station featuring:

• Tech hub with research and storage facilities
• Safe zones for high-tech protection
• Research facility for advanced technology
• Advanced constructor and quantum processors
• High-tier resources (Neodymium
Français:
etc.)
• Technology-focused community features

Advanced location for end-game content and high-tier resources!

English: Discover the enhanced community features throughout Nexon World
Italiano: and create a balanced multiplayer experience.

English:
Community hubs are located on each planet and provide:

• Trading facilities for commerce
• Storage systems for item management
• Workshop areas for crafting
• Rescue operations for player assistance
• Community meeting points
• Resource sharing capabilities

These hubs serve as central community centers for each world!

Safe zones provide essential protection:

• PvP disabled areas for new player safety
• Anti-griefing protection
• Community gathering spaces
• Emergency refuge locations
• Trading and social interaction areas
• Varying protection radius (200-600m)

Safe zones ensure new players can learn and build without harassment!

Supply depots offer essential resources:

• Emergency supplies for players in need
• Storage facilities for community use
• Rescue operations for stranded players
• Resource distribution centers
• Community support services
• Quick access to basic materials

Supply depots help maintain community sustainability!

The Nexon Challenge Arena hosts special events:

• Weekly challenges for community engagement
• Special event facilities
• Community competitions
• Reward distribution
• Skill-based activities
• Community building events

Participate in special events to earn unique rewards!
Learn about the enhanced starting experience in Nexon World

Each planet provides custom starting equipment:

• Small Constructor for basic building
• Oxygen Generator for life support
• Water Generator for hydration
• Solar Panel for power generation
• Battery for energy storage
• Food Processor for sustenance
• Basic resources (Wood
Portuguese (Brazil): etc.)\n\nCustom equipment ensures a smooth start on each world!

English:
Four difficulty levels are available:

• Easy: Enhanced starting status and equipment
• Normal: Balanced starting experience
• Hard: Challenging starting conditions
• Fresh Start: Minimal equipment for experienced players

Each level provides different starting health

Recommended first steps in Nexon World:

1. Visit your local community hub for resources
2. Establish a base near a safe zone for protection
3. Join community activities and events
4. Explore supply depots for additional resources
5. Participate in the challenge arena events
6. Build relationships with other players
7. Contribute to community projects

Community cooperation is key to success in Nexon World!
Discover the enhanced exploration features and optimized resource distribution throughout Nexon World
Deutsch: designed to provide balanced and rewarding gameplay.

English:
Exploration rewards include:

• Explorer tokens for visiting new systems
• Faction reputation increases
• Unlocked PDA chapters and information
• Special access to faction facilities
• Community recognition
• Unique discovery achievements

Exploration is highly rewarded in Nexon World!

Resource distribution is optimized:

• Enhanced resource spawning on all planets
• Increased counts and sizes for common resources
• High-tier resources available on Nexus Core
• Balanced distribution for fair gameplay
• Community resource sharing encouraged
• Sustainable resource regeneration

Resources are plentiful but require exploration to find!

POI regeneration is optimized:

• Community hubs: 720 minutes (12 hours)
• Safe zones: 1440 minutes (24 hours)
• Supply depots: 240-360 minutes (4-6 hours)
• Challenge arenas: 1440 minutes (24 hours)
• Standard POIs: 180-360 minutes (3-6 hours)
• Balanced for community sustainability

Regeneration times ensure continuous community resources!
